# PR Checklist (Agentic)

- [ ] Executed via slash command workflow
- [ ] `AGENT_REPORT.md` attached
- [ ] No barrel exports introduced
- [ ] Folder/type/test structure follows AGENTS.md
- [ ] Required tests executed and passing
- [ ] Docs updated for behavior changes
- [ ] `/ytui-review-docs-sync` executed
- [ ] Docs mapping provided (`code -> docs`)
- [ ] Plugin manifest validated (if plugin changes)
